user_request: A romantic poem about two hearts beating as one.
final_poem:
Beneath the moon’s unblinking eye,  
two drums in同步 rhythm rise—  
a pulse that threads the silent air,  
a dance of fire, a shared despair.  

Your breath, a tide that knows my shore,  
your touch, the map I’ve always worn.  
We stitch the night with trembling threads,  
each heartbeat hums the same old hymn.  

No need for words, this silent song—  
our souls entwined, one tangled throng.  
The stars above, the earth below,  
all spin to match our steady glow.  

In every beat, a whispered vow:  
to forge a world where love is now  
a constant flame, a steady tide,  
two hearts as one, forever tied.
